name: The Temple Carnival VR
description:
The Temple Carnival VR
</p>

The temple carnival VR brings an immersive virtual reality experience, allowing you to explore the park. VR needed: a mini-game collection. 

Enter a themed Thai-Japanese Temple Carnival Alley where you can play a game and earn tickets for virtual prizes or unlock another game.

support: Oculus Rift, HTC Vive
